message: I propose a fair split, with 90% for me and 10% for you.  Let's get this done quickly!
My turn! I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Think carefully, the value decreases with each round for you, Alice!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than 40%.  Let's meet in the middle at 55/45.  Time is running out!
Okay, Alice, let's try this. I'm offering you 4200. It's more than you would have gotten last round. Each round you wait costs you!
